feed.title: Category: RIA Cowboy Videos | James Ward

entry.title: Right90's Super-Sexy Enterprise Flex RIA
entry.content: While at Dreamforce 2009 I was able to see some amazing enterprise Flex RIAs. Here is an RIA Cowboy Video of Right90's Sales Forecasting application. Let me know what you think.

entry.title: RIA Cowboy Videos - Dreamforce 2008 - Model Metrics
entry.content: This is the last of the RIA Cowboy Videos from Dreamforce 2008. In this one I interview Model Metrics about some of the things they are doing with Flex and Salesforce. Cool stuff!

entry.title: RIA Cowboy Videos - Dreamforce 2008 - Infowelders
entry.content: Here's another video from Dreamforce 2008. In this one I talk with Infowelders about their custom data visualizations built with Flex and the Force.com platform. Very cool stuff!

entry.title: RIA Cowboy Videos - Dreamforce 2008 - Cloud9 Analytics
entry.content: In this video from Dreamforce 2008, Cloud9 Analytics shows me their Flex-based Pipeline Management Suite for Salesforce.com.

entry.title: RIA Cowboy Videos - Dreamforce 2008 - PivotLink
entry.content: In this video from Dreamforce 2008 PivotLink shows off their Flex-based SaaS BI product. Cool Stuff!
